structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Executive Office For Administration And Finance

law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. Repealed by 2012, 165, Sec. 66. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] The board shall submit an annual report to the division of capital asset management and maintenance listing all finalists selected by the board and all awards made pursuant to the provisions of sections thirty-eight A1/2 to thirty-eight O, inclusive, a summary of the activities and other actions of the board and its staff, and such other items as the board deems appropriate.
